dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3931 IH: Children's Health Insurance Protection (CHIP) Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Dent (for himself, Ms. Schwartz, Mr. Gerlach, Mr. Meehan, Mr. Fitzpatrick, Mr. Kelly of Pennsylvania, Mr. Thompson of Pennsylvania, and Mr. Barletta) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to allow for the continuation of the pre-ACA flexibility of States in providing CHIP coverage to low-income children.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Children's Health Insurance Protection (CHIP) Act.

section.header: Continuing pre-ACA State flexibility in providing CHIP coverage for low-income children
section.text: Effective January 1, 2014, section 1902(l)(2)(C) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1396a(l)(2)(C)) is amended by striking (or, beginning January 1, 2014, 133 percent).
